HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL: 99 Kč, Česká pošta: 109 Kč. Free for orders over 2000 Kč.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Within 60 minutes in selected cities (Prague, Brno, Ostrava, and 8 others)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna: 69 Kč, Česká pošta (Na poštu): 89 Kč. Free for orders over 2000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Zásilkovna Z-BOX: 69 Kč, Česká pošta Balíkovna: 65 Kč. Free for orders over 2000 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: 13 stores across the Czech Republic (e.g., Prague, Brno, Ostrava, Plzeň, Liberec, etc.)

express_delivery.delivery_time: Within 30 minutes if the item is in stock at the selected store.

weekend_delivery.days: Opening hours vary by store, many are open on Saturday and Sunday.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Mobil Pohotovost provides a wide array of delivery services in the Czech Republic, including standard Home Delivery, Parcel Shops, Parcel Lockers, and In-Store Pickup. There is no specific option for bulky items.
PROVIDERS: The main carriers are PPL, Česká pošta, and Zásilkovna. Express city delivery is handled by Liftago.
PRICING: Delivery costs range from 65 Kč to 109 Kč. Free shipping is offered on orders exceeding 2,000 Kč for most methods. In-store pickup is always free. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is a standard 40 Kč where available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The standout service is the 'Kurýr do 1 hodiny' (Courier within 1 hour) express delivery available in 11 major cities. Additionally, they offer a very fast 30-minute in-store pickup for items in stock at the branch.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly presented on a dedicated 'Doprava' page. All costs, delivery times, and special services are easy to find, making for a transparent customer experience.
